about_me.title: About me
about_me.subtitle: My introduction
about_me.description: I am currently a 9th semester student of the Computer Systems Engineering career at Instituto Tecnológico de Morelia, with a specialty in Information Security. I consider myself as a responsible, enthusiastic, and committed developer, who likes challenges and to learn new things every day.
about_me.description2: I love to code, but I am also into cybersecurity, server configurations and pentesting. I´m looking fordward to get CEH certification as soon as posible.
